button.localHelp: Poveži se s tokom in igraj kanal

textbox.text:
What about SkyStreamer?
Since we have a long and hard way ahead to build SkyStreamer your best personal multimedia app system, we invite you for a free registration, to connect and make our way more groovy! Don't worry, we will use your data solely to keep you posted on our progress and to help you access new functionalities. Our goal is to connect people in real-time throughout the world, with a help of GPS and soundy music via internet.
Thanks for gro(o)wing with us :)
